MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH42 area of Dunbar, affecting properties in Little Spott Cottages and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am due to repairs required to our overhead electricity network near Spott Mill and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:29am on Saturday, 06 February 2021
